destinations.name: Ooty & Coonoor
destinations.description: The Queen of Hill Stations, known for its sprawling tea gardens and colonial charm.
destinations.fullDescription: Nestled in the Nilgiri Hills, Ooty is one of the most popular hill stations in South India. Coonoor, its quieter neighbor, offers breathtaking views of tea estates.

destinations.name: Wayanad
destinations.description: A green paradise with spice plantations, waterfalls, and ancient caves.
destinations.fullDescription: Wayanad is known for its pristine beauty and rich tribal heritage. It's a perfect destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts.

destinations.name: Munnar
destinations.description: The emerald tea capital of South India.
destinations.fullDescription: Munnar is a must-visit for its rolling hills covered in tea plantations. The mist-covered mountains provide a romantic and peaceful atmosphere.

destinations.name: Kodaikanal
destinations.description: Princess of Hill Stations with its famous star-shaped lake.
destinations.fullDescription: Located in the Palani Hills, Kodaikanal is famous for its cool climate, beautiful gardens, and scenic viewpoints.

destinations.name: Goa
destinations.description: Sun, sand, and serenity on the shores of the Arabian Sea.
destinations.fullDescription: Goa is a kaleidoscope of cultures, with its Portuguese heritage and vibrant beach life. It offers something for every traveler.

destinations.name: France
destinations.description: The world's most visited country, a hub of art, fashion, and gastronomy.
destinations.fullDescription: From the romantic streets of Paris to the glamorous beaches of the Cote d'Azur, France offers an unparalleled European experience.
